SourceText: Would you like to keep working towards your current certificate on improving your relationship, or start the new course on child development? Reply "Relationship" or "Development" to choose!
text: Ungathanda ukuqhubeka ngokusebenzela isitifiketi sakho samanje ngokuthuthukisa ukudlelwano, noma uqale isifundo esisha ngokuthuthuka komntwana? Phendula "Ubudlelwano" noma "Ukuthuthuka" ukukhetha!

SourceText: Great! Let's keep going with your current course.
text: Kwakuhle! Masiqhubeke ngesifundo sakho osenzayo manje.

SourceText: üîë  Once you finish, you'll be able to start the Child Development course. Keep up the good work!
text: üîë Uma usuqedile, uzokwazi ukuqala isifundo Ukuthuthuka Kwengane. Qhubeka ngomsebenzi omuhle!

SourceText: fail
üëÄ Oops! You've timed out. If you want to rejoin ParentText, press 1.
text: üëÄ Eish! Uphelelwe isikhathi. Uma ufuna ukujoyina iParentText futhi, chofoza 1.

SourceText: üîë You will receive the opportunity to participate in the 3 month survey, and receive R75 airtime, whether or not you complete ParentText.
text: üîë Uzothola ithuba lokuhlanganyela kunhlolovo lwezinyanga ezintathu, bese uthola i-airtime ka-R75, uqeda noma ungaqedile ngeParentText.

SourceText: It looks like you‚Äôre not interested in the Child Development course right now. If you want to join the Child Development course later, just press 1. üìö
text: Kubukeka sengathi awunandaba nesifundo Ukuthuthuka Kwengane njengamanje. Uma ufuna ukujoyina Ukuthuthuka Kwengane ngesinye isikhathi, chofoza nje 1. üìö

SourceText: Remember, you can still take the 3-month survey and get R75 airtime, even if you don‚Äôt do the course. üéÅ
text: Khumbula, usengathatha unhlolovo lwezinyanga ezintathu bese uthola i-airtime ka-R75, noma ungasenzi isifundo. üéÅ

SourceText: You will continue with your progress tomorrow.
You can invite your family and friends to join the study and earn airtime, too! Just share this link with them: {rct link}
text: Ungamema umndeni wakho noma abangani ukujoyina unhlolovo, nabo bathole i-airtime! Bathumelele lelinki kuphela: {rct link}

SourceText: üéâ You've been selected to receive WASHText. Let's get started:
üéâ You've been selected to receive ParentText. Let's get started:
If you do not want to receive any more messages, please type "EXIT".
text: Uma ungasathandi ukuthola le miyalezo, sicela uthayiphe ‚ÄúPHUMA‚Äù.

SourceText: If you made a mistake, please type "BACK".
text: Uma wenze iphutha, sicela ubhale igama elithi "EMUVA".

SourceText: Thank you for participating. If you want to return to the programme, type HELLO.
text: Siyabonga ngokuhlanganyela. Uma ufuna ukubuyela ohlelweni, bhala ukuthi SAWUBONA.

SourceText: We hope to see you again soon!
